tool.name: dvipdf
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the dvipdf utility.

cvar.name: DVIPDF
cvar.summary: The TeX DVI file to PDF file converter.

cvar.name: DVIPDFFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the TeX DVI file to PDF file converter.

cvar.name: DVIPDFCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to convert TeX DVI files into a PDF file.

cvar.name: DVIPDFCOMSTR
cvar.summary: The string displayed when a TeX DVI file is converted into a PDF file. If this is not set, then &cv-link-DVIPDFCOM; (the command line) is displayed.
